segments.name: iPhone

Improved demand in May and June
Record active installed base
98% customer satisfaction for iPhone 11 series
Impact from COVID-19 most significant in April

Improved performance as quarter progressed

segments.name: Services

All-time records in App Store, Apple Music, Video, Cloud Services
Paid subscriptions up 130 million year-over-year
35 million sequential subscription growth
Double-digit paid account growth in all regions
Achieved 2x FY2016 services revenue goal ahead of schedule
New services continue to add users and content

Half of purchases from new-to-Mac customers

Strong reception to new iPad Pro

June quarter records in majority of markets
75% of Apple Watch buyers were first-time purchasers

products_gross_margin.context: Down 60 basis points sequentially due to FX and mix

services_gross_margin.context: Up 180 basis points sequentially due to mix

outlook_factors.supply_timing: New iPhones projected few weeks later than usual
